'''MINECON 2016 Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161001081335/http://mojang.com/2016/09/minecon-2016-skins-incoming-get-em-while-theyre-hot/|title=MINECON 2016 skins incoming! Get Â´em while they're hot!|website=Mojang.com|author=Marsh Davies|date=September 22, 2016}}</ref> is a celebratory [[skin pack]] for [[MINECON 2016]] that includes 14 skins. It includes all skins that were previously part of the [[Minecon 2015 Skin Pack]] and was available for free until October 3, 2016 on [[Legacy Console Edition]]s and October 7, 2016 on ''[[Bedrock Edition]]''.
